form.text:
“2/3 of the Himalayan
ice caps will melt by

2100 due to global
warming”

Boracay, an international leisure destination,
has decided to close for 6 months due to
severe pollution due to overtourism
The whole world is sick from pollution

Q. Assessing the current state of ecosystems
    and its causes
Will the Earth’s ecosystems be okay?
